title: ml5.js: KNN Classification Part 1
description: This video covers "KNN Classification." In this first part, I begin the process of building a "teachable machine"-style image classifier with ml5.js.

timestamps.title: Yining Shi's ml5 implementation of knn nearest neighbors
Nikhil Thorat's article on the Teachable Machine
Softmax: normalizes data to give probabilities
Using the feature.infer function to get the logits
Using datasync to get the "digital finger print" of an image
